  or other email providers. Adding support for Outlook would allow more users
  to benefit from email automation workflows."

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this feature hasn't been requested
- [ ] I have provided a clear problem statement and use case
- [ ] I have considered alternatives and trade-offs
- [ ] I have explained why this feature would be valuable to users
